name: Preprints.io
description: Preprints.io is a DeSci platform for sharing and discussing blockchain research. $PRNT is both a governance and utility token to encourage and reward peer review and fully decentralize the governance of the platform. With Preprints.io, research is stored as NFTs (ERC721 tokens) on the Polygon blockchain, ensuring they are immutably recorded. Authors can freely decide their manuscript's accessibility: offering open access or monetizing through ERC20 access tokens facilitated by the Ocean Protocol.
